name: Face with Monocle
baseMeaning: A face wearing a monocle with a raised eyebrow, suggesting scrutiny or skepticism.
tldr: Looking at something closely, being skeptical, or pretending to be fancy/intellectual.

contextMeanings.meaning: Looking at something more closely or investigating.
Expressing doubt or examining something critically.
Pretending to be sophisticated or intellectual in a joking way.

platformNotes.note: Often used to question claims or express skepticism.
Popular in code review contexts or when investigating bugs.
Used for humorous intellectual pretense or genuine analysis.

generationalNotes.note: Used ironically for fake sophistication or genuinely for skepticism.
Similar usage - skepticism or playful intellectualism.
May interpret as curiosity or careful examination.
